Sentencas: Thin-film samples of yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ), nickel oxide (NiO)-YSZ, and YSZ/nickel (Ni)YSZ bilayer were fabricated by RF-sputtering.
Titulo: Microstructural features of RF-sputtered SOFC anode and electrolyte materials

Sentencas: The single YSZ layer and YSZ/Ni-YSZ bilayer samples were annealed while the NiO-YSZ layer remained as-deposited.
Titulo: Microstructural features of RF-sputtered SOFC anode and electrolyte materials

Sentencas: Cross-section transmission electron microscopy (TEM) samples of these thin-films were then prepared, which allowed detailed chemical and structural characterization of these thin-films on the nanometer-scale.
Titulo: Microstructural features of RF-sputtered SOFC anode and electrolyte materials

Sentencas: Both YSZ and NiO-YSZ layers were fully dense and exhibiting equiaxed grain morphologies.
Titulo: Microstructural features of RF-sputtered SOFC anode and electrolyte materials

Sentencas: Selected area electron diffraction (SAED) showed the YSZ crystal structure to be predominantly cubic in the annealed samples and amorphous in the as-deposited NiO-YSZ sample.
Titulo: Microstructural features of RF-sputtered SOFC anode and electrolyte materials

Sentencas: It was found that YSZ film was 70 nm thick and dense, with equiaxed grains ranging from 12-20 nm.
Titulo: Microstructural features of RF-sputtered SOFC anode and electrolyte materials

Sentencas: Surface roughness of the YSZ in the bilayer fell in the range of 5-20 nm.
Titulo: Microstructural features of RF-sputtered SOFC anode and electrolyte materials

Sentencas: The Ni-YSZ film in the bilayer was 230 nm thick and porous, which consisted of columnar grains 13-75 nm in length and 9-22 nm in width.
Titulo: Microstructural features of RF-sputtered SOFC anode and electrolyte materials

Sentencas: The bilayer sample showed no delamination or cracking along the YSZ/Ni-YSZ interface.
Titulo: Microstructural features of RF-sputtered SOFC anode and electrolyte materials

Sentencas: It is believed that the nano-sized grains, minimal surface roughness and thin layers found in these films are desirable microstructural features for the anode and electrolyte in micro-solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Microstructural features of RF-sputtered SOFC anode and electrolyte materials

Sentencas: Correlation between microstructural features and electrochemical performance will be reported in a separate study.
Titulo: Microstructural features of RF-sputtered SOFC anode and electrolyte materials
